## isAgenticTui() function

Checks if code is running inside any agentic TUI application.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isAgenticTui(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

true if running inside an agentic TUI, false otherwise

## Example


```ts
import { isAgenticTui } from 'is-agentic-tui';

if (isAgenticTui()) {
  console.log('Running inside an agentic TUI');
}
```
